title: Is saying "with the Grace of Allah" & Alhamdulillah the same thing? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: so his third question is it the same to say with the grace of allah and alhamdulillah the answer is as long as you're attributing the favor and blessing of of allah azzawajal to him then there's no problem if you say i managed to do my project on time or i manage to do my project with the grace of allah on time or i achieve this all of this is legit and there's no nothing wrong in that you
